betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now that you've got your DNA you put it in the culture vat along with a Bio-Goo and power to get your turn your DNA/seeds into eggs, embryos, or sacs.

Note that each run takes a single bio-goo and it can sometimes fail resulting in bad stuff like the block turning to water and spawning a failasaurus.

The plant stuff you can simply place down on the dirt and grow it

Dino/Lizard eggs are placed down and need a light source near them and will eventually hatch

Bird eggs are thrown to hatch like chicken eggs

Bug eggs are placed and hatch imediately

Aquatic creatures have their eggs place in water and will imediately hatch

Embryos are right clicked on vanilla mammals and will pop out when they give birth after a good while

To see which is which check the "Featured Creatures" quest above this one
